subject: Basketball (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jahlil Okafor, an intriguing freshman at Duke who draws comparisons to Tim Duncan, is staying quiet about his plans for entering the N.B.A. draft.
snippet: Jahlil Okafor, an intriguing freshman at Duke who draws comparisons to Tim Duncan, is staying quiet about his plans for entering the N.B.A. draft.
